revision.text:
__NOTOC__{{new|4.13.0}}
clearscope Name '''GetDecalName''' () const
==Usage== Gets the name of the actors' attached decal generator.
===Return value=== The name of the actors' decal generator as a [[ZScript_data_types#Names|Name]] type.
==Examples== This call will make the calling actor spray their {{property|Decal|Decal property}}-defined decal 64 map units in front of themselves. <syntaxhighlight lang="csharp"> A_SprayDecal (GetDecalName(),64); </syntaxhighlight>
==See also== *[[Decal]]
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]]
